asayler@Albatross:$ ./swls
  | SW Adr | IP Address |       Types        |  #Ch |  Ver |    SW Device UID  
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00| 0x0001 | 0x7f000001 | 0x8000000000000001 | 0x00 | 0x01 | 0x0000000000000001
01| 0x0010 | 0x7f000001 | 0x8000000000000004 | 0x02 | 0x01 | 0x0000000000000010
02| 0x0011 | 0x7f000001 | 0x8000000000000004 | 0x02 | 0x01 | 0x0001000000000011
03| 0x0012 | 0x7f000001 | 0x8000000000000004 | 0x02 | 0x01 | 0x0001000000000012
04| 0x0013 | 0x7f000001 | 0x8000000000000004 | 0x02 | 0x01 | 0x0000000000000013
05| 0x0014 | 0x7f000001 | 0x8000000000000004 | 0x02 | 0x01 | 0x0000000000000014
06| 0x0015 | 0x7f000001 | 0x8000000000000004 | 0x02 | 0x01 | 0x0000000000000015
